comments.raw_text: Valgrind reports that there are dangerous bytes going over the wire. This is completely reproducible for me by running |EXTRA_TEST_ARGS="--debugger=valgrind --debugger-args='--smc-check=all'" TEST_PATH=content/svg/content/test/test_text.html make -C fennec-dbg/ mochitest-plain|

comments.text:
Created attachment 542937
Valgrind log

Valgrind reports that there are dangerous bytes going over the wire. This is completely reproducible for me by running |EXTRA_TEST_ARGS="--debugger=valgrind --debugger-args='--smc-check=all'" TEST_PATH=content/svg/content/test/test_text.html make -C fennec-dbg/ mochitest-plain|
